title: Bloomberg Markets: Ackman Says Settlement With ADP `Unlikely'
itunes:title: Bloomberg Markets: Ackman Says Settlement With ADP `Unlikely'
description:
Bloomberg Markets with Carol Massar and Cory Johnson.\u0010\u0010GUEST:\u0010Scott Deveau\u0010Deals Reporter \u0010Bloomberg News\u0010Discussing Bill Ackman said a settlement with Automatic Data Processing Inc. is “unlikely” as the activist investor defended his track record amid repeated attacks by the company’s management and board.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
